overview: Many years ago in the village of Kamyanytsya there was the largest ski jump, which attracted numerous tourists, which brought profit to local residents. But the years did not spare this sports facility, and the number of tourists was decreasing. But even in this difficult time, two rogues of the owners of a small hotel are trying to survive as best they can, even if for this it is necessary to rob the unlucky guests.
title: The Land of Destroyed Ski Jump Hill
